title: Cognitive Engagement Design Strategies in Online Asynchronous Classes

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with online learning environments and basic instructional design knowledge
context.additional_context: Applying blended instructional methods to strengthen advanced expertise in social fields for working professionals

learning_goals: Learners generate questions promoting critical thinking on discussion boards with over 80% participation rates.
Learners submit practical projects linked to real-world applications with 90% completion rates by applying guest lecture content.
Learners demonstrate cognitive growth by revising and resubmitting final assignments two or more times based on feedback.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
